story_08_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
For s-s-some reason, it’s even colder than
it was b-before...
story_08_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I’ve been thinking about it, and I guess I was
kind of rushing for no good reason.
story_08_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I thought I could do it all myself,
and I hope I didn’t make you feel bad.
story_08_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
At times like these, I wish I could fine myself.
I hope you can forgive me, Flannery!
story_08_04000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Oh... Well, uh, I was actually about to apologize
to you, too, Barry!
story_08_04000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I’m the one who should be sorry!
That was all my fault earlier.
story_08_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I was the one who panicked. I was trying too
hard to live up to my title of Gym Leader
and totally missed the mark.
story_08_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: Oh, you felt that way, too, huh?
story_08_04000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I guess that’s why we were so out of sync
in that battle.
story_08_04000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Ah, it seems you’ve found the answer to what
was missing, then. It’s time for us to head back
to Pryce.
story_08_04000/2401_1001_1900_10: You two can show him what you’ve learned!
story_08_04000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Oh, it’s you again.
Back to challenge me again, are you?
story_08_04000/2401_1001_2100_10: That’s right, old man! Give us one more battle!
story_08_04000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Just you watch! It’s gonna be completely
different from last time! Flannery,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...let’s do this!
story_08_04000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Oh, I like that determined expression.
This will be good.
story_08_04000/2401_1001_2600_10:
I am known as the Winter Trainer.
Let me show you what I’m capable of!
